unnormalised: India beat Pakistan in yesterday's nail-biting match! The final score was India 182/7 & Pakistan 181 all out. What a game, bhai!
normalised: India beat Pakistan in yesterday's nail-biting match! The final score was India one hundred and eighty two for seven and Pakistan one hundred and eighty one all out. What a game, bhai!

unnormalised: Batting first, Pakistan managed to put up 181 runs. Babar Azam scored a brilliant 65 off 48 balls, while Md. Rizwan contributed 42. Bumrah took 3 wickets for 22 runs, bowling some serious jaffas.
normalised: Batting first, Pakistan managed to put up one hundred and eighty one runs. Babar Azam scored a brilliant sixty five off forty eight balls, while M-d. Rizwan contributed forty two. Bumrah took three wickets for twenty two runs, bowling some serious jaffas.

unnormalised: Chasing 182, India had a shaky start. Rohit Sharma got out early, scoring just 12. Virat Kohli managed 35, and Suryakumar Yadav chipped in with 28. But the real hero was Hardik Pandya, who smashed 40 off 20 balls.
normalised: Chasing one hundred and eighty two, India had a shaky start. Rohit Sharma got out early, scoring just twelve. Virat Kohli managed thirty five, and Suryakumar Yadav chipped in with twenty eight. But the real hero was Hardik Pandya, who smashed forty off twenty balls.

unnormalised: With 2 needed off the last ball, Pandya hit a six! India won by 4 wickets. What a finish! The stadium erupted, and the celebrations are still going on. Next match on 20/06/2024. Don't miss it!
normalised: With two needed off the last ball, Pandya hit a six! India won by four wickets. What a finish! The stadium erupted, and the celebrations are still going on. Next match on twentieth june two thousand and twenty four. Don't miss it!
